entities.label: IFRS S2 Climate-related Disclosures
entities.description: Sustainability disclosure standard requiring entities to disclose information about climate-related risks and opportunities

entities.label: Climate-related Risks
entities.description: Risks to which the entity is exposed, including physical and transition risks

entities.description: Physical risks arising from climate change

entities.description: Risks arising from transition to lower-carbon economy

entities.description: Asset types where climate-related risks and opportunities are concentrated

entities.label: Capital Expenditure
entities.description: Capital expenditure for business development addressing climate-related matters

entities.description: Additional expenditure on research and development for climate-related matters

entities.label: Direct Mitigation and Adaptation Efforts
entities.description: Changes in production processes, equipment, facility relocation, workforce adjustments, and product specifications

entities.label: Indirect Mitigation and Adaptation Efforts
entities.description: Working with customers and supply chains for climate mitigation and adaptation

entities.description: Entity's plan for climate transition including key assumptions and dependencies

entities.label: Greenhouse Gas Emissions Targets
entities.description: Climate-related targets including GHG emissions reduction goals

entities.label: Climate-Related Risks and Opportunities
entities.description: Climate-related factors affecting entity's operations and strategy

entities.label: Current Financial Effects
entities.description: Effects of climate-related risks and opportunities on financial position, performance and cash flows for reporting period

entities.label: Anticipated Financial Effects
entities.description: Expected effects of climate-related risks and opportunities on financial position over short, medium and long term

entities.label: Resource Allocation for Climate Activities
entities.description: Current and planned resourcing for climate-related activities

entities.label: Progress on Climate Plans
entities.description: Quantitative and qualitative information about progress of previously disclosed plans

entities.label: Material Adjustment Risk
entities.description: Climate-related risks with significant risk of material adjustment to asset and liability carrying amounts

entities.label: Climate-related risks and opportunities
entities.description: Climate-related factors that may affect an entity's financial position, performance, and cash flows

entities.label: Financial position changes
entities.description: Expected changes to entity's financial position over short, medium and long term due to climate strategy

entities.label: Investment and disposal plans
entities.description: Plans for capital expenditure, acquisitions, divestments, joint ventures, business transformation, innovation, and asset retirements

entities.label: Planned sources of funding
entities.description: Sources of funding to implement climate strategy

entities.label: Financial performance changes
entities.description: Expected changes to financial performance over short, medium and long term

entities.label: Cash flow changes
entities.description: Expected changes to cash flows over short, medium and long term

entities.label: Revenue from lower-carbon products
entities.description: Increased revenue from products and services aligned with a lower-carbon economy

entities.label: Physical damage costs
entities.description: Costs arising from physical damage to assets from climate events

entities.label: Climate adaptation/mitigation expenses
entities.description: Expenses associated with climate adaptation or mitigation

entities.label: IFRS S2
entities.description: IFRS S2 Climate-related Disclosures standard

entities.label: Measurement uncertainty
entities.description: Level of uncertainty in estimating financial effects that may make quantitative information not useful

entities.label: Short, medium and long term
entities.description: Time periods for assessing climate-related financial impacts

entities.label: Climate-related Risks
entities.description: Risks arising from climate-related changes, developments and uncertainties that may affect an entity's strategy and business model

entities.label: Climate-related Opportunities
entities.description: Opportunities arising from climate-related changes that an entity can take advantage of

entities.label: Financial Effects
entities.description: Quantitative and qualitative impacts of climate-related risks and opportunities on financial statements

entities.label: Climate Resilience
entities.description: The resilience of the entity's strategy and business model to climate-related changes, developments and uncertainties

entities.label: Climate-related Scenario Analysis
entities.description: Analytical approach used to assess an entity's climate resilience considering various climate-related scenarios

entities.label: Financial Resources
entities.description: Availability and flexibility of existing financial resources to respond to climate-related effects

entities.label: Climate-related Investments
entities.description: Current and planned investments in climate-related mitigation, adaptation and opportunities

entities.label: Asset Management Capacity
entities.description: Entity's ability to redeploy, repurpose, upgrade or decommission existing assets in response to climate change

entities.label: IFRS S2 Climate-related Disclosures
entities.description: IFRS Sustainability Disclosure Standard for climate-related disclosures

entities.label: Climate-related scenario analysis
entities.description: Analysis method used to assess entity's resilience to climate-related changes, developments or uncertainties

entities.label: Climate-related transition risks
entities.description: Risks associated with transition to lower-carbon economy

entities.label: Climate-related physical risks
entities.description: Physical risks associated with climate change impacts

entities.label: Climate-related opportunities
entities.description: Opportunities arising from climate-related changes and developments

entities.label: Scope 1 greenhouse gas emissions
entities.description: Direct greenhouse gas emissions generated by the entity

entities.label: Scope 2 greenhouse gas emissions
entities.description: Indirect greenhouse gas emissions from purchased energy

entities.label: Scope 3 greenhouse gas emissions
entities.description: Other indirect greenhouse gas emissions in value chain

entities.label: Absolute gross greenhouse gas emissions
entities.description: Total greenhouse gas emissions generated during reporting period

entities.label: Climate-related targets
entities.description: Targets set to mitigate or adapt to climate-related risks or take advantage of opportunities

entities.label: Risk management processes
entities.description: Processes to identify, assess, prioritise and monitor climate-related risks and opportunities

entities.label: Cross-industry metric categories
entities.description: Standardized metrics applicable across industries for climate-related disclosures

entities.label: Industry-based metrics
entities.description: Metrics associated with particular business models, activities or industry characteristics

entities.label: Greenhouse Gas Protocol
entities.description: Corporate Accounting and Reporting Standard (2004) for measuring greenhouse gas emissions

entities.label: Climate-related policies
entities.description: Policies in jurisdictions where entity operates affecting climate-related matters

entities.label: Energy usage and mix
entities.description: Entity's energy consumption patterns and energy source composition
